name: Space Royale (rudyvic)
description:
Welcome to Space Royale!

We're in an unspecified time in the future. There is a new game, called Space Royale, where 100 spaceships fight each other in an asteroids field. Only one can win, and there is glory only for him.

This game was made for #dreamarcadearchive game jam (2020).

Gameplay

You control a spaceship and the object of the game is to shoot and destroy the other spaceships. One hit and a spaceship is destroyed, even yours.

It's a multi-directional shooter arcade game characterized by an old-style graphic and sound, mixed with a single-player battle royale component.

Like in a classic battle royale game, there is a safe zone that gets smaller over time, and if you touch the safe-zone limits you die. Your goal is to remain the only one alive.

You can upgrade your weapon by destroying enemy spaceships (the upgrade can be higher shoot rate or higher bullets fired simultaneously).

You can play safely, trying to avoid any combat, or you can play aggressively, trying to kill more spaceships as you can. It's up to you.

Note: don't be afraid of colliding with other spaceships or asteroids, it won't damage you.

Controls

WASD/ARROWS: move
Mouse: aim

Credits

Made with Godot 3.2

Font: Edit Undo Line BRK

Music: 8bit on the offensive V2 - by Ted Kerr
